title: Coleen Rooney seen for first time since social media return after Rebekah Vardy row
text:

Coleen Rooney has been spotted out after her return to social media yesterday following her infamous spat with fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy .

Wayne Rooney 's wife accused Rebekah Vardy's Instagram account of leaking stories to a British tabloid, before going totally radio silent online.

Today, the Liverpool-born beauty was spotted out for the first time since breaking her silence.

Coleen returned to Twitter over the weekend, posting a picture of her youngest son, Cass, after falling ill before their annual family holiday.

(Image: MEGA)

She was photographed heading out of her home in Cheshire wearing a black tracksuit and talking on the phone.

The mother-of-four was deep in conversation on her phone as she walked along while clutching a water bottle.

Coleen's casual outing comes as the rest of her family are currently enjoying the Barbados sunshine on the annual Rooney half-term holiday.

(Image: MEGA)

The 33-year-old broke her social media silence yesterday with a tweet. She posted: "Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass.

"We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break. Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave."

She added: "I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better."

(Image: MEGA)

Coleen's parents and her footballer husband recently touched down in the Caribbean with Kai, nine, Klay, six, and Kit, three.

While her family soaked up the sunshine, Coleen enjoyed an autumnal park day with their youngest son, Cass, 20 months.

Rebekah , who is married to Jamie Vardy , also recently returned to Instagram after she went to war with Coleen.

The pregnant WAG, 37, has got 49,000 new followers in the wake of what has branded as the WAGatha Christie scandal.

(Image: Twitter)

In the epic takedown that nearly broke the internet, the nation watched in shock as Coleen exposed Rebekah's account and told her followers she became suspicious when stories were getting published about her that only her select followers could know about.

Coleen explained how she blocked all users apart from Vardy's account from seeing her social media stories, then purposely posted false information to see if it ended up in the press.

Vardy, who is pregnant with her fifth child, has vehemently denied all allegations and hired a cyber security expert to clear her name.
description: Coleen was spotted out after she made a comeback to social media and revealed she was forced to skip her family holiday
